properties.title: Saffron - The Red Gold from the village
properties.abstract: Saffron has been grown on the sunny terrace of the mountain village of Mund since the 15th century. For the price of fourteen thousand Swiss Francs per kilogram.
properties.description:
Today, Mund is the most northern place on earth where Saffron is cultivated. Saffron is truly a precious spice â€“ on 4.2 acres the annual harvest is a mere three kilograms! The price of one kilogram Red Gold from Mund is a stunning fourteen thousand Swiss Francs.

Our tip: Hike the nature trail in Mund and learn about the precious spice. We also recommend a visit to the local Saffron museum. End your visit by tasting some local specialties made with authentic Red Gold from Mund.
properties.name: Blatten - Belalp Tourismus
